page.title: 09S'gate/The Green cont'd
page.content: {Local History:} {People:} Sir Anthony Berry was MP for Enfield-Southgate until his tragic death last October from the IRA bomb at Brighton. His successor is Michael Portillo. The constituency has been controlled by Conservatives for the last 20 years. The famous tennis player, Jo Durie lives locally. She has participated at Wimbledon in the past. The writer, Leigh Hunt, was born in Southgate. He was very fond of its peaceful rural environment. The area has royal connections from its proximity to Enfield Chase which was hunted by kings and nobles for many centuries.
